The abundance of employee perks and benefits serves, at least in part, to amend for the salaries that are, on average, slightly below market value for comparable positions. The career advancement and opportunity conversation also varies between departments and management staff rather than being a company-wide culture of employee development. Therefore, as should be the case regardless, you may need to take more ownership of your personal career path as in some cases no clear path is identified even when inquired about.
